summary: Contoso Wireless offers three internet packages - Basic, Standard, and Premium - that include unlimited data usage and access to over 400,000 Wi-Fi hotspots across the United States. The Basic package offers speeds up to 50Mbps with up to 10 devices connected, the Standard package offers speeds up to 100Mbps with up to 15 devices connected, and the Premium package offers speeds up to 1Gbps with up to 20 devices connected. All packages come with 24/7 customer support and technical assistance, as well as a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not completely satisfied with your service. Additionally, they offer additional features such as parental controls and advanced security features for an additional fee.
